name: That One Bat
description:
Some random bat woke up lost in a deep cave, she wanted to make this cave hers so she started killing everybody with her bat gunz.

You need to kill 100 enemy bats to earn the cave. Will you succeed ?

Tutorial

Use W-A-S-D to move your bat on the screen

You will have to move a light halo with your Mouse

Use Left-Click to shoot with your gun

Use Mouse-Wheel up and down to switch weapons

You have a Gun, a Shotgun and a Rifle

Credits

Game design and code : Luc Dercourt

Graphics : Alexis Demoulin

Music and sound design : Mathis Guerard

Created during the 48H Rage Jam
